mantra: I create my own path and walk it with joy.
My positive thoughts guide me to new heights.
I am not afraid to be wrong.
I am conquering my fears and becoming stronger each day.
I will have a good day, because it’s my choice.
Good health is a practice, and I have patience.
Everything you need is within you.
I will speak with confidence and self-assurance.
It's a good day to have a good day.
Don't talk about it, be about it.
Plan for victory, learn from defeat.
Change your thoughts, change your world.
All is well, right here, right now.
Be a warrior, not a worrier.
I choose to be calm and at peace.
Every day in every way I’m getting better and better.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
I love myself. No matter what.
I am in control of my own emotions.
Change the things you can change. Make peace with the things that cannot be changed.
I believe in my skills and abilities.
Where I am right now is exactly where I need to be.
Every day is a new beginning.
Suffering is temporary. It gets better
I am worthy of good things.
I am thankful for all life has given me.
Negative thoughts only have the power if I allow them.
My greatest struggles are my greatest lessons.
My thoughts are filled with positivity and my life is plentiful with prosperity.
I am calm, connected to others and cared for.
I do not judge myself or others.
I have the power to create change.
I feel beautiful, I am beautiful.
Great things are achieved through small steps.
I radiate beauty, charm and grace.
I am the person I want to be. My future is in my hands.
To struggle is not to fail.
If I desire greatness, I must work for it.
Go slowly. Take the time to do things right.
Look back at the past. Marvel at how far you have come.
One bad chapter does not make the book of your life.
I am letting go and taking care of me.
I am moving beyond what I once thought possible.
I am following my passion and finding my purpose.
One season doesn't define my story.
